elements.name: User login to SMT application and navigate to Reports tab

steps.name: User is on home page of SMT application
User is able to see login button on home page
User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"

elements.name: Verify user is able to download all excel report

steps.name: User type and select "UAE L2" from "Store" in "Reports" tab

User press escape button on keyboard
User validate UI and "Excel" data for "Arrivals"
